context: Can you see the keys clearly with the back light off?
response: Yes the letters have a silver color when turned off.  Also the lights are very easy to turn off and on.

context: I have the Wii mini, can this game still be played on it with no wi-fi connectivity?
response: I do not know what a WII mini - but we do not have wi fi connected to ours

context: I downloaded the game COD 4 MW but steam isnt working and i cant get to my game!!!!
response: You don't have to download this game from Amazon. Download steam from steampowered.com and open your games library then click the "Games" menu then click "Activate a Product on Steam". Follow the wizard to add your product key which you would have received in email from Amazon and the game will work.

context: Where do you ship from?
response: We ship the item from Miami, FL.Thanks

context: does this program work on windows 8 .1
response: I wouldn't know.  It works with Windows 7.  I have not gone to 8.

context: includes subtitles in spanish ???
response: yes, you can play it in spanish!! an excellent product!

context: Is it in a box which includes the manual and the offer code
response: This game includes a full color manual and a code to download the extra content. There is no expiration date for the code so if you buy this game today you can download the extra content.

context: Is this game backwards compatible with the 3DS?
response: It is! I own a 3DS XL. All Nintendo DS games are compatible with the 3DS. :)

context: the controllers come with the battery and charging cable? and come in black color?
response: No, they come with 2 double A (AA) alkaline batteries. The rechargeable battery pack and charging cable is an additional $20. That's for any controller, old or new.

response: How do you install the game in windows 8?

context: can nintendo dsl 3d games be played on the nintendo 3d system?
response: No, there is a tab on the 3 DSL

context: Does this game requires video controller or the Active floor Mat?
response: It require the Wii remote controller does not need a mat. Just a good set of space to move.

context: how long is the wire?
response: The cords are lengthy. The one from the controller to the headset is plenty long and the others that plug into the TV are almost too long

response: Sorry Eric I really can't answer that question cause the only uncharted I've played was the one on vita but I still do think this game is great if you play the last of us from naughty dog then you will also like this game

context: I have Beats Wireless bluetooth headphones.  With this device, will they output in-game sound and also allow me to chat? The Beats have a microphone.
response: Chat only. No game sound.

context: Does this game has two disks or codes for the DLCs?
response: Yes, bonus content is on one disc and the game in on the other disc. Two discs. (:

context: Is it wireless and would it be good for playing Mz PacMan
response: It is not wireless but the stick has a nice feel and clicks in a most satisfying way. I use it for fighting games but see no reason why it would not work well for mz pacman or any other classic game.

context: is this the same freecell on my windows seven computer
response: No it is not. I found the All-in-One Solitaire really disappointing. I deleted it from my computer.

context: Work fine in Win7 64bits ? to Il2 saga ... Thanks

response: I have not done responsive test with controller connected to system.

context: How come it says it has 4 games but when i download I only have 1?
response: Open My Documents and look in the My Games folder

context: Is there a monthly fee?
response: No, this is not an MMO!  You only have to pay for PS+ if you want to play with other gamers online, so the actual game does not have a fee!  However, you should be able to play for free with up to 4-player splitscreen!

context: Will it work with a New Nintendo 3DS XL?
response: Yes it should. I don't believe there's been a change in screen size, and this article says so too. http://www.kotaku.com.au/2014/12/nintendo-new-3ds-xl-australian-review/

context: I already have the game and part of the expansions on my computer, if I bought this just for the extra expansions, will it install on top ok?
response: Yes, and toy week get the codes for the rafts items as well, just Dave the activation codes for the Parts you already have because they'll still be usable be SOMEONE.

context: I have the 2nd/3rd gen. "fat ps3" my cable ports are spread out on the back of the ps3, how high is this fan connected to the PS3 in the back?
response: It'll fit fine, but I retuned mine because it didn't stop the overheating at all.

context: After you install this, Under Control Panel - Sound - RecordingDoes - "Stereo Mix" show as an option?Thanks
response: No, the sound card only shows up as a Microphone In (under recording) and as "Speakers" (under Playback). Sorry, this doesn't sound like the the sound card you're looking for it seems.

context: For how many players is this game?
response: The mass effect trilogy is mostly a single player experience although mass effect 3 does have a multiplayer survival that is up to 4 players.

context: May I use it in Guatemala?
response: Yes, you can use it anywhere in the world, however only on the US playstation store.
